grid: grid gap-1 justify-items-stretch place-items-center grid-cols-2 xs:grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 xl:grid-cols-2 2xl:grid-cols-2

item.hover: cursor-pointer hover:text-orange-500 hover:border transition duration-1000 ease-in-out
item.class: py-1 w-full h-full self-center content-center content-type-card border border-solid border-stone-100 rounded-lg bg-stone-50
